page.title: 15HALTEMPRICE SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: This area is well provided for in terms of sports facilities. Apart from two golf clubs and a bowls club there is a modern, public sports complex on Gorton Road, Willerby.This is Haltemprice sports centre.The main building houses a 25 metre pool, a 12 metre learning pool, a large gym, 5 squash courts, an indoor bowling green, a multi-gym and a projectile hall.There is also a restaurant and bar to relax and recover in. Outside the main building is an all weather, floodlit training pitch, two football fields and a children's play area with swings etc. The latest additions are two artificial , outdoor bowling greens. Built at a cost of over Â£100 000 they are the first of this kind in the North of England.
